snippet: Police officers in Bushwick came across a man who had been shot in the arm early Friday, and were then confronted by a man the victim identified as the attacker, the authorities said.
abstract: Police shoot Jerrol Harris in leg in Bushwick, Brookyn, after he opens fire on another man and then officers
lead_paragraph: Police officers in Bushwick came across a man who had been shot in the arm early Friday, and were then confronted by a man the victim identified as the attacker, the authorities said.

headline.main: After Being Fired Upon, Officers Shoot Man in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Man Shot by Officer Fired First, Police Say
